fields.name: Web Design
fields.description:
- Affordable personal and business websites
- Custom hosting solutions to meet your budget
- Maintain it yourself or let us handle everything for a nominal monthly fee
- [Contact us](/contact/) for a FREE quote

fields.name: VPN Solutions
fields.description:
- Point-to-Point or Site-to-Site
- Home and Small office Road Warriors
- SSL/TLS and/or PKCS#11 dual-factor authentication
- Pre configured virtual appliances

*[SSL]: Secure Socket Layer
*[TLS]:  Transport Layer Security
*[PKCS]: Public Key Cryptography Standards

fields.name: Custom Builds
fields.description:
- Custom Desktops
- Gaming PCs
- File, Web, VPN, Proxy, Media, & Remote Access Servers

*[VPN]: Virtual Private Network
*[PCs]: Personal Computer

fields.name: Networking
fields.description:
- Wireless configuration and connection troubleshooting
- Wireless repeater/bridge/AP solutions
- Security hardening
- Reliability/performance troubleshooting

*[AP]: Access Point

fields.name: Mobile Devices
fields.description:
- Email Configuration
- Backup/Restore
- Optimize for visual/hearing impaired
- Rooting (Android only)
- Carrier Unlock Codes

fields.name: Lessons
fields.description:
- Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, etc.
- Microsoft Windows, Apple OSX & iOS
- ALL THINGS LINUX

fields.name: Device Setup
fields.description:
- Home PCs
- Office Workstations
- Mobile Devices
- Networking Hardware

*[PCs]: Personal Computer

fields.name: Repairs
fields.description:
- Upgrades
- Component Replacement
    * Motherboard
    * RAM
    * CPU
    * Power Supply

*[RAM]: Random-access Memory
*[CPU]: Central Processing Unit

fields.name: Backup Solutions
fields.description:
- One-Time and/or Automated Backups
- NAS, RAID Setup
- Preconfigured Virtual Appliances

*[NAS]: Network-attached Storage
*[RAID]: Redundant Array of Independent Disks
